" A COMMITTEE TO REDUCE SPENDING? Mike Pence Jeff Duncan ( R-S.C.) plans to introduce legislation to create a "committee on nonessential federal expenditures," according to an alert passed along by a source. The committee would be based on the` Byrd Committee' proposed by Senator Harry Byrd( D-VA) in the 77th Congress. That committee is credited with saving taxpayers$ 38 billion( in inflation adjusted dollars) during its existence. The committee would be unique in that its sole purpose would be to reduce federal spending.
